movies.title: Rurouni Kenshin
movies.originalTitle: Rurôni Kenshin: Meiji kenkaku roman tan
movies.plot: In 1868, after the end of the Bakumatsu war, the former assassin Kenshin Himura promises to defend those in need without killing. Kenshin wanders through Japan with a reverse-edged sword during the transition of the samurai age to the New Age. When Kenshin helps the idealistic Kaoru Kamiya from the gangsters of the powerful opium drug lord Kanryuu Takeda that wants her school for his production of opium, Kaoru invites Kenshin to stay in the school. But the drug chemist Megumi Takani escapes from Kanryuu and seeks shelter in the school. Meanwhile the killer Battosai is murdering police officers and leaving messages attached to their bodies. When Kanryuu poisons the population to get the school, Kenshin and the street fighter Sanosuke Sagara join forces to attack their common enemy.
movies.simplePlot: A former assassin who has resolved to never kill again has his vow sorely tested.

biography.bio: J. Michael Tatum was born on May 25, 1976 in McKinney, Texas, USA as John Michael Tatum. He is known for his work on Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood (2009), Dragon Age: Dawn of the Seeker (2012) and Summer Wars (2009).
biography.name: J. Michael Tatum

biography.bio: Josh Grelle was born on November 2, 1985 in Clifton, Texas, USA. He is an actor and writer, known for Mass Effect: Paragon Lost (2012), Gatchaman (1972) and Starship Troopers: Invasion (2012).
biography.name: Josh Grelle

biography.bio: Takeru Satô was born on March 21, 1989 in Saitama, Japan. He is an actor, known for Rurouni Kenshin (2012), Kenshin Kyoto Inferno (2014) and Kenshin: La fin de la légende (2014).
biography.name: Takeru Satô

biography.bio: Eric Vale was born on April 28, 1974 in Grand Prairie, Texas, USA as Christopher Eric Johnson. He is an actor and writer, known for One Piece (1999), Dragon Ball Z (1996) and Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood (2009).
biography.name: Eric Vale

biography.bio: Alexis Tipton was born on August 11, 1989. She is an actress, known for Fullmetal Alchemist: The Sacred Star of Milos (2011), Summer Wars (2009) and Dragon Age: Dawn of the Seeker (2012).
biography.name: Alexis Tipton

biography.bio: Emi Takei was born on December 25, 1993 in Aichi Prefecture, Japan. She is an actress, known for Rurouni Kenshin (2012), Kenshin Kyoto Inferno (2014) and For Love's Sake (2012).
biography.name: Emi Takei

biography.bio: Yû Aoi was born on August 17, 1985 in Fukuoka, Japan as Yû Natsui. She is an actress, known for Tekkonkinkreet (2006), Redline (2009) and Hula Girls (2006).
biography.name: Yû Aoi

biography.bio: Micah Solusod was born on August 21, 1990 in Hawaii, USA as Micah M. Solusod. He is known for his work on Soul Eater (2008), Backstage Pass (2016) and Les enfants loups, Ame & Yuki (2012). He has been married to Apphia Yu since April 1, 2016.
biography.name: Micah Solusod

biography.bio: Trina Nishimura was born on August 8, 1983 in Sacramento, California, USA as Trina Marie Nishimura. She is an actress, known for .hack//Quantum: The Worldend Pallbearer (2011), Summer Wars (2009) and Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood (2009).
biography.name: Trina Nishimura

biography.bio: Kent Williams was born on October 11, 1964 in Commerce, Texas, USA as James Kent Rice Williams. He is known for his work on Dragon Ball Z (1996), Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood (2009) and Yu Yu Hakusho: Ghost Files (1992).
biography.name: Kent Williams

biography.bio: John Swasey was born on October 18, 1964 in Houston, Texas, USA as John Allan Swasey. He is an actor and director, known for Ray (2004), Dazed and Confused (1993) and Fullmetal Alchemist the Movie: Conqueror of Shamballa (2005). He has been married to Dena Summerfield since April 12, 1996. They have two children.
biography.name: John Swasey

biography.bio: Robert McCollum was born on September 8, 1971 in the USA as Robert Howard McCollum. He is an actor and editor, known for Grappler Baki kyokudai taikai (2001), Baki the Grappler (2001) and Summer Wars (2009). He was previously married to Kristin M. Williams.
biography.name: Robert McCollum

biography.bio: Teruyuki Kagawa was born on December 7, 1965 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Tokyo Sonata (2008), Les contes de Terremer (2006) and Les démons à ma porte (2000).
biography.name: Teruyuki Kagawa

biography.bio: Masataka Kubota is an actor, known for 13 assassins (2010), Death Note (2015) and Jellyfish Eyes (2013).
biography.name: Masataka Kubota

biography.bio: Gô Ayano is an actor, known for The Light Shines Only There (2014), 64: Part I (2016) and The Snow White Murder Case (2014).
biography.name: Gô Ayano

camera: Red Epic, Zeiss Master Prime and Fujinon Premier Lenses
Red One MX, Zeiss Master Prime and Fujinon Premier Lenses

titlesAwards.titleAwardOutcome: Nominated Award of the Japanese Academy
